forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. High 57F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 10C. Winds WSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 51F. Winds WSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 52F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 4C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 40F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 57F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
